Detailed Description

A class that calculates the repulsive forces between CPSs.

◆ calc()

bool repulsion::calc ( )

Check whether collision avoidance is necessary and calculate respective position or velocity.

Returns
Whether collision avoidance is necessary. Also false if class not properly initialized.

geometry_msgs::PoseStamped repulsion::get_dir ( )

Get the direction in which to move for collision avoidance.

Returns
A pose with the current position of the CPS and the direction away from the other CPSs.

◆ init()

void repulsion::init ( double  dist_critical,
double  dist_avoid,
string  repulsion_shape 
)

Configure the repulsion behavior through parameters.

Parameters
dist_criticalDistance between CPSs below which the collision avoidance will work maximally.
dist_avoidDistance between CPSs below which collision avoidance is active.
repulsion_shapeThe shape of the repulsion function.

Definition at line 9 of file repulsion.cpp.

◆ repulse()

void repulsion::repulse ( geometry_msgs::Vector3 &  repulsion,
int &  neighbors,
double &  closest 
)
private

Calculate repulsion from close by CPSs.

Parameters
repulsionReturns the repulsion vector, i.e., the sum of the vectors pointing away from the neighbors.
neighborsReturns the number of neighbors that create repulsion.
closestReturns the distance to the closest neighbor.
